name: KungfuTaxi
description:
KungfuTaxi reached Top1 in: China, Taiwan,Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam, Brazil, France, Spain, Italy,Uruguay. We also reached Top 20 in 62 countries!
Recommended by itunes in 114 countries around the world!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Kungfu Taxi" is a unique and exciting game. Created and developed by Keyloft LLC. It is inspired by Chinese painting "Along the River during the Qingming Festival" from Song Dynasty, by Zhang Ze Duan.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Features:
－ 30 exciting levels and a challenging Endless Mode;
－ Multiple scenes and environments;
－ Challenges from traps, exploding bombs, rocks, cute zombies and the dangerous animals like Alpacas, Qinchuan bulls and Tibetan mastiffs!;
－ Mysterious props provide you all kinds of supports;
－ Stylized costumes with special abilities are also available in store;
－ Unique Chinese Shan-Shui painting style graphic design;
－ Support Retina displays & iPhone 5 "tall" screen.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
'The game requires very good reflexes and is undoubtedly one of the best games released on iOS this month.'----AppCroc.com

'This is a game with some personality behind it.'----iphoneappreviews.net

'There aren’t a whole lot of video games, iOS or otherwise, inspired by 12th century Asian art.'—— AppTudes
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Visit our website: http://www.keyloft.com
